# Text List



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                                                                                      | Type                             | Default       |
| ----------- | ------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------------------------------- | ------------- |
| `listType`  | `list-type`  | The type of the text list.                                                                       | `'ordered'` <br> \| `'unordered'`       | `'unordered'` |
| `orderType` | `order-type` | The list style type of an ordered list.                                                          | `'alphabetically'` <br> \| `'numbered'` | `'numbered'`  |
| `theme`     | `theme`      | Adapts the text color depending on the theme. Has no effect when 'inherit' is set as color prop. | `'dark'` <br> \| `'light'`              | `'light'`     |
